promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary frilled-lizard grass-type pokemon wearing a leafy crown. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Leafendary, a a gigantic legendary frilled-lizard grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Meteor Blast, Draconic Impulse. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "grass" or "Leafendary". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald galaxy background
generatedDescription: Verdant titan of the woods, this colossal creature harnesses celestial forces for Meteor Blast and Draconic Impulse attacks.
